_header: A Lord God of mights most / Father and Son and Holy Ghost
_description: William of Nassington, Tractatus de Trinitate et Vnitate — in couplets

BLAdd33995.First Lines:
A louerd god of myght mastfader and son and haly
                    gast…
BLAdd33995.Last Lines:
…Louerd Ihesu Crist yhtt thank I yeÞat alle þis
                    & mar has done for me

Lincoln91.First Lines:
A lord god of myghtes mastefader and son and haly gasteffader
                    for þu ert almyghttyson for thow ert all wytty…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…thurghe whilke I may at þe dredfull daybe led to þe
                    blyse þat sall last a
Lincoln91.Note: 432 lines, written one couplet per line in MS.
Lincoln91.Attributed Title:
Incipit Tractatus Wilelmi Nassyngton quondam aduocati Iuris Eboraci de
                        Trinitate & Vnitate cum declaracione operum dei & de passione domini
                        nostri ihesu Cristi & cetera (f. 189)

                MS.

YaleBeiOs19558.First Lines:
[ ][ya][ ][h]eued ya[t][A Crown]e of thornys yat priked ye
                    sar…
YaleBeiOs19558.Last Lines:
…Elles thurt ye haf tholed nane oyer paynBot ye ded anely
                    forto by vs agayn…
YaleBeiOs19558.Note:
A fragment of 47 lines [some partially illegible] in two columns on the
                    inside of the wrapper.
